creator: mircea.butmalai@radcom.ro
text:
I have configured a virtual machine with a balancer with two members in 
httpd.conf file.
When I use Apache Benchmark with more than 50 concurrent requests everything 
works fine when the bencmark is executing, but after it finishes the computer  
stop responding and many httpd threads are in "Uninterrputible sleep" state.
The server is still working but very slow. When i access /server-status is 
reporting many slots in "Closing" state.

I presume that something goes wrong when apache kills child processes which 
created connection pools to backend servers (BalancerMembers).

creator: jim@apache.org
text: Is this to backend http servers or via AJP?
